titleStmt.title: The English souldiers standard to repaire to, for wisdome and understanding, in these doleful back-sliding times. To be read by every honest officer to his souldiers; and by the souldiers, one to another.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to William Walwyn; this attribution rejected by McMichael and Taft, The writings of William Walwyn, p.532.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
